migrations, cost optimization, threat modeling, well architected security framework & compliance in the cloud.
ACCOMPLISHMENTS / PROFILE SUMMARY

migrations, cost optimization, threat modeling, well architected security framework & compliance in the cloud.
ACCOMPLISHMENTS / PROFILE SUMMARY
➢I have worked directly withMicrosoft Azure, GoogleGCPas my customers for running Cisco software
routers on public clouds. Optimized cloud costs, compliance work based on a well architected framework.
➢Deep expertise in AWS security services - Inspector, Macie, Shield, Security Hub, Guard duty, IAM,
CloudWatch, CloudTrail, Detective, AWS Audit Manager etc.
➢Implemented Data Protection & security controls - CASB, SIEM for a Fortune500 financial client. Took
security courses at CyLab (#1 leading institute in the world) - pioneer in security & privacy research
programs.
➢AwardedCisco Achievement Program (CAP) award 22 timesfor excellence with customers:AWS, GCP,
Azure,Deutsche Telecom, Telstra, AT&T, Verizon, OBS,etc
➢Cisco Voice Technologies– Designed and implementedseveral solutions based on Cisco Voice

Azure,Deutsche Telecom, Telstra, AT&T, Verizon, OBS,etc
➢Cisco Voice Technologies– Designed and implementedseveral solutions based on Cisco Voice
Technologies and worked in the team that pioneered the effort to move into the Saas model.
➢Designed and built a Golang based docker service that integrates Cisco software applications. – NSO, ML
based orchestration platform (CrossWork), opensource – Kafka, Grafana to provide a full loop change
automation that dynamically changes network topologies based on observed network parameters. Presented
it at Cisco Live June 2019 – conference widely attended by Cisco customers.
➢Developed a Golang application (full stack with Echo Web Framework/Java Script) for Software Defined
Networking (SDN) dynamically changing topologies and demonstrated at the Global Sales conference
(SEVT) in Feb 2021.
➢Developed Golang docker application on Cisco flagship SDN platform and integrated it with Big Data

(SEVT) in Feb 2021.
➢Developed Golang docker application on Cisco flagship SDN platform and integrated it with Big Data
platform for streaming Telemetry to win a competitive deal from a big named Service Provider.
➢Cloud Migration - Migrated an on-prem SDN application (Docker/Kubernetes microservices) to the cloud
platforms -AWS, Azurewith emphasis on security,cost optimization, reliability & performance.
➢Led the back-end development on Cisco SDN platform based on Vertx/Java/Python/Nodejs framework.

PAD RAJENDRAN
Email:reachtechpoint@gmail.comPhone: 412-589-3046
➢Architected/developed/operated software cloud solutions on AWS using CloudFormation APIs to automate
the deployment and configuration of Cisco routers – architected a solution using AWS Lambda to achieve
changes to configuration based on dynamic events such as VPC creation; on Azure using ARM templates.
Developed a Golang microservice on Cisco SDN platform which is a keeper of business logic and acts as
northbound interface.
➢Wrote Ansible playbooks to automate the application (microservices) deployment across the lab and on
cloud platforms - AWS, Azure.
➢Expertise in presenting to wider audience – software demos, architectures both internally and to customers,
developers, partners. Developed customer reference guides, marketing collaterals and delivered sales
training. Delivered software demos/training on multiple occasions to Sales, Marketing, Customer Support
and Professional Services.

training. Delivered software demos/training on multiple occasions to Sales, Marketing, Customer Support
and Professional Services.
➢Worked on various phases of solution development from planning & design to customer delivery.
Experience in troubleshooting & debugging various cloud platforms and distributed virtualized
environments. Experience in Agile environments (Scrum, Kanban, SAFe)
TECHNICAL SKILLS:
Programming-GoLang, Nodejs, Java, Python, C;Serverless-AWS Lambda;Databases-SQL,
NoSQL - MongoDB, Cassandra;Infrastructure-Kubernetes,Docker, VMware, Openshift;
CI/CD, DevOps- Ansible, AWS CloudFormation, Jenkins,JIRA, Microsoft Azure, Google GCP;
Web Frameworks– Vertx Java, Echo Golang, Django;Message queues- Kafka, AWS SQS.
WORK EXPERIENCE
TechPointNC – Senior Solutions Architect & Security Consultant07/16 - Present

controls, data protection and locking down AWS accounts.

Redshift.

Redshift.

➢Built a data processing framework on DataProc using PySpark to extract & transform sales data
obtained from Oracle EBS.

cloud costs.
